verses.roman:
tāv ajñāpayataṁ bhṛtyaṁ
kim ahaṁ karavāṇi vām
puṁso 'ty-anugraho hy eṣa
bhavadbhir yan niyujyate

synonyms: tau—They; ājñāpayatam—should please order; bhṛtyam—Their servant; kim—what; aham—I; karavāṇi—should do; vām—for You; puṁsaḥ—for any person; ati—extreme; anugrahaḥ—mercy; hi—indeed; eṣaḥ—this; bhavadbhiḥ—by You; yat—in which; niyujyate—he is engaged.
translation: Please order me, Your servant, to do whatever You wish. To be engaged by You in some service is certainly a great blessing for anyone.
